text: To further confirm that nascent HIV - 1 viral particles could recruit IFITMs , cryo - EM was performed on cells co - expressing HIV - 1 and IFITM3 using anti - p24 and anti - Flag antibodies conjugated to gold beads of different sizes ( Figure 3D ) . The results obtained with this analysis indicated that IFITMs are indeed present at sites of Gag budding , further supporting the notion that IFITMs are truly incorporated into HIV - 1 virion particles .
